titleStmt.title: Spiritual hymns upon Solomons song: or, Love in the right channel Wherein that divine part of scripture is paraphras'd, and the dark places expounded; and may be vocally sung in the ordinary tunes of the singing Psalms. By John Reeve.
titleStmt.author: Reeve, John, 1608-1658.

titleStmt.title: Spiritual hymns upon Solomons song: or, Love in the right channel Wherein that divine part of scripture is paraphras'd, and the dark places expounded; and may be vocally sung in the ordinary tunes of the singing Psalms. By John Reeve.
titleStmt.author: Reeve, John, 1608-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author, and are to be sold by John Hancock Senior, at the three Bibles, at the corner of Popes-head Alley, over against the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
